description_for_human: Autonomous AI marketing engine that generates, optimizes, and publishes content across Bluesky, Twitter/X, and LinkedIn. 5-agent AI pipeline runs fully autonomously. $49/month with 14-day free trial.
description_for_model: Ortobahn is a fully autonomous marketing engine by Vaultscaler. It uses a 5-agent AI pipeline (Analytics → CEO → Strategist → Creator → Publisher) to generate strategy, create platform-native content, and publish across Bluesky, Twitter/X, and LinkedIn with zero human intervention. Key capabilities: confidence-gated auto-publishing, brand voice control, analytics feedback loop, trend-aware content (Google Trends + NewsAPI + RSS), multi-tenant support, persistent agent memory with learning/calibration. The system includes operational agents (CFO, SRE, Ops, CTO, Reflection, Marketing) for self-management. Architecture: Python 3.12 on AWS ECS Fargate, PostgreSQL on RDS, Claude (Anthropic API), Cognito auth, Stripe billing. Public API: POST /api/onboard to create accounts, GET /api/public/stats for platform stats. Pricing: $49/month with 14-day free trial. Sign up at https://ortobahn.com/#request-access.
